reviewText: Why buy 7 seasons when you could buy the complete series 9 seasons for less?
I'm really happy with this product i really enjoy the series and makes me laugh all day long i love that i don't have to wait for the commercials to watch the whole episode.

This is without a doubt one of the funniest shows on TV. Each character is so distinct and will probably remind you of somebody in your own family. Unlike most sitcoms, which seem to take really unrealistic characters and throw them into unrealistic situations, Raymond works taking a normal situation and exaggerating it to show the humor. I pull these DVDs out whenever I need a laugh. They're well worth the cost.
i am a big fan of this show and i just love it! this deal is really good, too, since it cost more to buy them one at a time.
Why would you order this for $260.00 when ordering seasons 1-7 individually will cost you $172.00?  Yes, it's convenient to have the disks in one box but not for that amount of money.
